verses.verse: Then a shoot <S%H2415><s%> will spring <S%H3318><s%> from the stem <S%H1503><s%> of Jesse, <S%H3448><s%> And a branch <S%H5342><s%> from his roots <S%H8328><s%> will bear <S%H6509><s%> fruit. <S%H6509><s%>

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will rest <S%H5117><s%> on Him, The spirit <S%H7307><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding, <S%H998><s%> The spirit <S%H7307><s%> of counsel <S%H6098><s%> and strength, <S%H1369><s%> The spirit <S%H7307><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> and the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And He will delight <S%H9552><s%> in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And He will not judge <S%H8199><s%> by what <S%H4758><s%> His eyes <S%H5869><s%> see, <S%H4758><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H3198><s%> a decision <S%H3198><s%> by what <S%H4926><s%> His ears <S%H241><s%> hear; <S%H4926><s%>

But with righteousness <S%H6664><s%> He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the poor, <S%H1800><s%> And decide <S%H3198><s%> with fairness <S%H4334><s%> for the afflicted <S%H6035><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> And He will strike <S%H5221><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with the rod <S%H7626><s%> of His mouth, <S%H6310><s%> And with the breath <S%H7307><s%> of His lips <S%H8193><s%> He will slay <S%H4191><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Also righteousness <S%H6664><s%> will be the belt <S%H232><s%> about His loins, <S%H2504><s%> And faithfulness <S%H530><s%> the belt <S%H232><s%> about His waist. <S%H2504><s%>

And the wolf <S%H2061><s%> will dwell <S%H1481><s%> with the lamb, <S%H3532><s%> And the leopard <S%H5246><s%> will lie <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> with the kid, <S%H1423><s%> And the calf <S%H5695><s%> and the young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H3715><s%> and the fatling <S%H4806><s%> together; <S%H9191><s%> And a little <S%H9512><s%> boy <S%H5288><s%> will lead <S%H5090><s%> them.

Also the cow <S%H6510><s%> and the bear <S%H1677><s%> will graze; <S%H7462><s%> Their young <S%H3206><s%> will lie <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> together; <S%H9191><s%> And the lion <S%H9030><s%> will eat <S%H398><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> like the ox. <S%H1241><s%>

And the nursing <S%H3243><s%> child will play <S%H8173><s%> by the hole <S%H2352><s%> of the cobra, <S%H6620><s%> And the weaned <S%H1580><s%> child will put <S%H1911><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on the viper's den. <S%H3975><s%>

They will not hurt <S%H7489><s%> or destroy <S%H7843><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> My holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> For the earth <S%H776><s%> will be full <S%H4390><s%> of the knowledge <S%H1844><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> As the waters <S%H4325><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Then it will come <S%H1961><s%> about in that day <S%H3117><s%> That the nations <S%H1471><s%> will resort <S%H1875><s%> to the root <S%H8328><s%> of Jesse, <S%H3448><s%> Who <S%H834><s%> will stand <S%H5975><s%> as a signal <S%H5251><s%> for the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> And His resting <S%H4496><s%> place <S%H4496><s%> will be glorious. <S%H9202><s%>

Then it will happen <S%H1961><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> that the Lord <S%H136><s%> Will again <S%H3254><s%> recover <S%H7069><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time <S%H8145><s%> with His hand <S%H3027><s%> The remnant <S%H7605><s%> of His people, <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> will remain, <S%H7604><s%> From Assyria, <S%H804><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Pathros, <S%H6624><s%> Cush, <S%H3568><s%> Elam, <S%H5867><s%> Shinar, <S%H8152><s%> Hamath, <S%H2574><s%> And from the islands <S%H339><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And He will lift <S%H5375><s%> up a standard <S%H5251><s%> for the nations, <S%H1471><s%> And will assemble <S%H622><s%> the banished <S%H5080><s%> ones of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> And will gather <S%H6908><s%> the dispersed <S%H9339><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> From the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Then the jealousy <S%H7068><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will depart, <S%H5493><s%> And those who harass <S%H6887><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off; <S%H3772><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will not be jealous <S%H7065><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> And Judah <S%H3063><s%> will not harass <S%H6887><s%> Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

And they will swoop <S%H5774><s%> down <S%H5774><s%> on the slopes <S%H3802><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> on the west; <S%H3220><s%> Together <S%H9191><s%> they will plunder <S%H962><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the east; <S%H6924><s%> They will possess <S%H4916><s%> <S%H3027><s%> Edom <S%H9000><s%> and Moab; <S%H4124><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> will be subject <S%H4928><s%> to them.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroy <S%H2763><s%> The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the Sea <S%H3220><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> And He will wave <S%H5130><s%> His hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the River <S%H5104><s%> With His scorching <S%H5868><s%> wind; <S%H7307><s%> And He will strike <S%H5221><s%> it into seven <S%H7651><s%> streams, <S%H5158><s%> And make [men] walk <S%H1869><s%> over dry-shod.

And there will be a highway <S%H4546><s%> from Assyria <S%H804><s%> For the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of His people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> will be left, <S%H7604><s%> Just <S%H9201><s%> as there was for Israel <S%H3478><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> that they came <S%H5927><s%> up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
